long-description:"THE COLLISION IS INEVITABLE! THE IMPACT WILL BE UNAVOIDABLE!
This is a new project from ARC SYSTEM WORKS which develops many innovative and high-quality works in the genre of fighting game. 2D TAG team based fighting game that you would have never imagined!

■About Open-βeta period
Download this trial version and Join in Open-βeta for online play.

・Period of Online play
Customer Pre-ordered from PS Store：5/ 9(Wed)16:00～5/14(Mon)24:00
For everyone : 5/12(Sat)16:00～5/14(Mon)24:00
※Schedule may change without any notification.

・Playable Characters : 20 Characters

・Playable Mode
Casual Lobby
Tactics Mode (Basic・Practical Application Only)
VS Mode (with CPU)
VS Mode (2P Play) ※Only for Pre-ordered customer from PS Store.

■After Open-βeta is terminated
